00001 import wx
00002 from iga.gacommon import gaParams
00003 
00004 class CollaboratePanel(wx.Panel):
00005 
00006     def __init__(self, parent, color="GRAY", name = "", orientation = wx.VERTICAL):
00007         wx.Panel.__init__(self, parent = parent)
00008 
00009         self.SetBackgroundColour('WHITE')
00010 
00011         self.name = name
00012         self.orientation = orientation
00013 
00014         self.sizer = wx.BoxSizer(orientation)
00015 
00016         self.SetSizer(self.sizer)
00017 
00018         self.best = None
00019         self.worst = None
00020         self.parent = parent
00021         self.child_panels = []
00022         self.feedback_option = ['Add to Genome', 'Unselect']
00023         self.user_feedback = set()
00024 
00025 #------------------------------------------#
00026     def clear(self):
00027         self.sizer.Clear(True)
00028         self.Layout()
00029 
00030 #------------------------------------------#
00031     def onFeedback(self, event_object, panel):
00032         f_option = self.feedback_option
00033         label = event_object.GetLabel()
00034 
00035         # if wanting genome
00036         if label == f_option[0]:
00037             self.user_feedback.add(self.child_panels.index(panel))
00038         else:
00039             panel.unselectAll()
00040             self.user_feedback.remove(self.child_panels.index(panel))
00041 
00042 
00043 #------------------------------------------#
00044     def clearFeedback(self):
00045         '''
00046         Clear all user selections made to
00047         individuals from other peers.
00048         '''
00049         self.user_feedback.clear()
00050         for panel in self.child_panels:
00051             panel.unselectAll()
00052 
00053 #------------------------------------------#
00054     def getPeerGenomes(self):
00055         genomes = [self.genomes[i] for i in self.user_feedback]
00056         self.clearFeedback()
00057 
00058         return genomes
00059 
00060 
00061 #------------------------------------------#
00062     def drawGenomes(self, genomes):
00063         panels = gaParams.draw(self, genomes)
00064         self.addPanels(panels)
00065         self.genomes = genomes
00066 
00067 #------------------------------------------#
00068     def addPanels(self, panels, expand = True):
00069         self.clear()
00070         self.child_panels = panels
00071         rowSize = 3
00072 
00073         space = (5, 5)
00074 
00075         if gaParams.params.has_key('rowSize'):
00076             rowSize = gaParams.params['rowSize'] 
00077 
00078         if expand:
00079             def addtorow(row, panel):
00080                 row.Add(panel, 1, wx.EXPAND)
00081         else:
00082             def addtorow(row, panel):
00083                 row.Add(panel, 1)
00084 
00085         self.sizer.AddSpacer(space)
00086         self.SetFont(wx.Font(11, wx.SWISS, wx.NORMAL,wx.FONTWEIGHT_BOLD))
00087         self.sizer.Add(wx.StaticText(self, -1, 'Peer Genomes'), 0, wx.EXPAND|wx.ALIGN_CENTER)
00088         self.SetFont(wx.SystemSettings.GetFont(1))
00089 
00090         for i in xrange(0, len(panels), rowSize):
00091             row = wx.BoxSizer(wx.HORIZONTAL)
00092             row.AddSpacer(space)
00093             num_cols = min(rowSize, len(panels)-i)
00094 
00095             for j in xrange(num_cols):
00096                 addtorow(row, panels[i+j])
00097 
00098             row.AddSpacer(space)
00099             addtorow(self.sizer, row)
00100 
00101         self.sizer.AddSpacer(space)
00102 
00103         self.Layout()
